title: Royal wedding: Bonanza for Meghan's dress designer
text:
Royal wedding: Bonanza for Meghan's dress designer 4:33am IST - 01:51 
American actress Meghan Markle joins the British royal family in less than two months' time when she marries Prince Harry and who will design her wedding gown is the subject of much debate. As Ciara Lee reports, having apparel seen on a member of Britain's royal family often leads to a spike in sales. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
